com.github.moribund.entity

Interface PlayableCharacter

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    Player

    public interface PlayableCharacter
    The PlayableCharacter interface is a template for a character that can be interacted with by keys. All playable characters are assumed as visible and movable.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void bindKeys()
      Binds the keys to the keyBinds using the Input.Keys constants to delegate Runnable actions.
      void draw(com.badlogic.gdx.graphics.g2d.SpriteBatch spriteBatch)
      Draws the player onto the screen.
      Tile getCurrentTile()
      Gets the current Tile the player is on.
      java.util.Set<Flag> getFlags()
      Gets the current active Flags on the PlayableCharacter.
      it.unimi.dsi.fastutil.ints.AbstractInt2ObjectMap<PlayerAction> getKeyBinds()
      Gets the respective PlayerAction for the Input.Keys value pressed.
      int getPlayerId()
      Gets the player's unique ID generated by the connection.
      void keyPressed(int keyPressed)
      Handles the key being pressed by a player after it has gone through client-server latency.
      void keyUnpressed(int keyUnpressed)
      Handles the key being lifted by a player after it has gone through client-server latency.
      void setTile(Tile tile)
      Sets a new Tile for the player to now currently be on.

        Binds the keys to the keyBinds using the Input.Keys constants to delegate Runnable actions.

        Draws the player onto the screen.

      • getPlayerId

        int getPlayerId()
        Gets the player's unique ID generated by the connection.
        Returns:
        The Player's unique ID.

      • getKeyBinds

        it.unimi.dsi.fastutil.ints.AbstractInt2ObjectMap<PlayerAction> getKeyBinds()
        Gets the respective PlayerAction for the Input.Keys value pressed.
        Returns:
        The key binds defined by bindKeys().

      • getFlags

        java.util.Set<Flag> getFlags()
        Gets the current active Flags on the PlayableCharacter.
        Returns:
        The current active Flags.

      • keyPressed

        void keyPressed(int keyPressed)
        Handles the key being pressed by a player after it has gone through client-server latency.
        Parameters:
        keyPressed - The Input.Keys value that was pressed.

      • keyUnpressed

        void keyUnpressed(int keyUnpressed)
        Handles the key being lifted by a player after it has gone through client-server latency.
        Parameters:
        keyUnpressed - The Input.Keys value that was lifted.
